publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4150 Dr Elaine Murray: Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign—That the Parliament pays tribute to the vital role road transport workers in both the bus and road haulage industries play in the Scottish economy; believes it is essential that these workers are treated fairly and have the right to work in a safe working environment, which includes the provision of toilet, wash and drinks facilities; congratulates the Transport and General Workers Union on its "free to pee" campaign, and welcomes the International Transport Workers’ Federation’s campaign in support of road transport workers worldwide. R Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Karen Gillon*, Michael McMahon*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Margaret Jamieson*, Marlyn Glen*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Shiona Baird*, Sarah Boyack*, Trish Godman*, Carolyn Leckie*, Christine May*

S2M-4150 Dr Elaine Murray: Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign—That the Parliament pays tribute to the vital role road transport workers in both the bus and road haulage industries play in the Scottish economy; believes it is essential that these workers are treated fairly and have the right to work in a safe working environment, which includes the provision of toilet, wash and drinks facilities; congratulates the Transport and General Workers Union on its "free to pee" campaign, and welcomes the International Transport Workers’ Federation’s campaign in support of road transport workers worldwide. R Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Karen Gillon, Michael McMahon, Ms Sandra White, Mr Frank McAveety, Margaret Jamieson, Marlyn Glen, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Jackie Baillie, Shiona Baird, Sarah Boyack, Trish Godman, Carolyn Leckie, Christine May, Cathie Craigie*, Dr Jean Turner*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Robin Harper*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4150 Transport and General Workers Union "Free to Pee" Campaign (lodged on 21 March 2006) Phil Gallie*
